FOOTER_COMPONENT_1_BODY_TEXT_1: TrendSource is your go-to platform for unearthing the latest and greatest products before they go mainstream.
FOOTER_COMPONENT_1_BODY_TEXT_2: Our cutting-edge algorithms scour the web for emerging trends and innovative ideas, curating them into a centralized hub.
FOOTER_COMPONENT_1_BODY_TEXT_3: Whether you're an early adopter, influencer, or simply curious about what's next, TrendSource keeps you ahead of the curve.
FOOTER_COMPONENT_1_BODY_TEXT_4: Join our community of trendsetters and never miss out on the next big thing.
PAGE_DETAIL_1_VALUE: Our app scours the market for the latest and greatest product launches, keeping you ahead of the curve.
PAGE_DETAIL_2_VALUE: Get tailored suggestions based on your interests and preferences, ensuring you never miss out on products you'll love.
PAGE_DETAIL_3_VALUE: With regular updates and alerts, you'll always be in the know about the coolest new gadgets and must-have items.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_FOOTER_CONTENT: Stay ahead of the curve with Unveil. Explore cutting-edge products from around the world and be among the first to experience the latest innovations.
SIDEBAR_BOTTOM_SUBTEXT_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Stay ahead of the curve with our product finder
TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER: Hear from some satisfied customers who found great new products with our app.
TESTIMONIAL_1_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: This app is a game-changer for discovering fresh, innovative products. The recommendations are on point!
TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: I was stuck in a rut buying the same things over and over. This app helped me break out and find really cool, unique items.
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: As a small business owner, I rely on this app to stay ahead of the latest product trends and offer my customers the newest arrivals.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_CALL_TO_ACTION_SUBTITLE: Stay ahead of the curve with our curated collection of cutting-edge products.
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_1: Stay connected with this stylish and feature-packed smartwatch.
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_2: Experience crystal clear audio without the hassle of cords.
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_3: Never run out of battery with this high-capacity power bank.
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_4: Monitor your activity, sleep, and more with this sleek wearable.
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_5: Enjoy your music anywhere with this powerful Bluetooth speaker.
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_6: Immerse yourself in virtual worlds with this top-rated VR headset.
CTA_BODY: Stay ahead of the curve with our cutting-edge app that curates the latest and greatest products across diverse categories. From innovative gadgets to trendy fashion items, we've got you covered.
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: ProductHunter is an app that helps you discover the latest and greatest products in various categories like tech, fashion, home goods, and more. Our platform curates new and trending products from across the web.
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: Our team of product experts scours the internet for newly launched products. We evaluate them based on innovation, design, utility and early reviews. The best new products get featured on our app for you to discover.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: What categories of products can I find?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: You can find products across many categories including tech gadgets, clothing, beauty, home decor, kitchen tools, outdoor gear, and much more. We aim to cater to all interests and lifestyles.
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: Yes, the ProductHunter app is completely free to download and use. We make money through affiliate marketing partnerships when you purchase featured products.
HERO_SUBTITLE: Stay ahead of the curve with our cutting-edge product discovery platform.
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Get answers to common questions about our product discovery app
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Our app helps you find and explore new products across various categories like tech, fashion, home goods, and more. Stay up-to-date with the latest releases and trends.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: How does the product discovery work?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: Our algorithm curates a personalized feed of new products based on your interests and preferences. You can also search and filter by category, price range, and other criteria.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: Can I save products I'm interested in?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: Yes, you can create wishlists and save products you like. The app will notify you of price changes and restocks for saved items.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: Absolutely! You can follow friends and influencers to see what products they're interested in. Share your finds and get recommendations from your network.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: We value your input! You can submit feedback and suggestions through the in-app form or by emailing support@productfinder.com.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_HERO_SECONDARY_TITLE: Stay ahead of the curve with our product discovery app
FEATURE_1_BODY: Stay ahead of the curve with our curated collection of the latest product releases across various industries.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Our intelligent algorithm learns your preferences and suggests new products tailored to your unique interests.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Get in-depth analysis and honest opinions from industry experts to make informed purchasing decisions.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Easily compare features, pricing, and user ratings to find the perfect product for your needs.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Be among the first to know about upcoming product launches and secure early bird discounts.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Connect with like-minded individuals, share your experiences, and get valuable feedback from our active user community.
PERSON_NAME: Introducing Novelty Nook - your gateway to the latest and greatest products on the market. Whether you're a trendsetter or simply love being ahead of the curve, our app is designed to curate the most innovative, unique, and exciting new offerings across various categories. From cutting-edge tech gadgets to ground-breaking inventions and fresh takes on everyday essentials, Novelty Nook brings the thrill of discovery right to your fingertips. Get ready to be among the first to explore, experience, and embrace the next big thing!
LANDING_PAGE_ANNOUNCEMENT_TEXT: Discover the latest and greatest new products - all in one place!
LANDING_PAGE_SUB_HERO_TEXT: Explore a curated selection of innovative products from emerging brands across all categories.
